TC.Description: To Validate the availability of 'Allocation' screen via Client 360 screen
To Validate the availability of fields available on header of Allocation screen(via client 360 screen)
To Validate the availability of grid columns available on Allocation screen(via client 360 screen)
This case is designed to test dynamic logic between Allocated column and checkbox column
This case is designed to test that transaction which has been fully marked for allocation, will not be available for allocation for next SRP
This case is designed to test validation message if same sign transaction is selected
This case is designed to test value of Last Paid Date column of Allocation screen
